name: Space Drifters 2D (In Development)
description:
Space Drifters 2D, is a top down space shooter with Newtonian physics style movement.
Made in the Unity engine with graphics and controls reminiscent of Asteroids with the added benefit of a local co-op and multiple versus modes.

>> Demo Available here <<

Current Features (0.9.A)
- Newtonian player movement (keep moving in the direction you've thrusted in)
- 2 Firing Modes: Automatic Laser and Scatter Gun (in Full Version)

- Single Player
-- Solo Endless
--- Five types of Enemy
--- Difficulty Increases Overtime
-- Asteroid Defence
-- Dodge

- Local Multiplayer
-- Versus (Arena / Asteroid Field)
-- King of the Hill
-- Hold the Flag
-- Endless Co-Op
-- Race (Planets / Asteroid Field)

- Original Soundtrack
- Windows, Mac and Linux
- Works with xbox 360 controller
